MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllButNulAndAngleBracketsLegal As UrlQuerySanitizer.IValueSanitizer

Docs.summary: Return a value sanitizer that allows any special characters except angle brackets ('<' and '>') and Nul ('\0').

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllButNulLegal As UrlQuerySanitizer.IValueSanitizer

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllButWhitespaceLegal As UrlQuerySanitizer.IValueSanitizer
